text: Tyance paigambara tyanna mhanale ki kaya allaha (jo satya ahe) tyacyavisayi sanka ahe, jo akasanca va dharatica nirmana karanara ahe to tara tumhala asasathi bolavita ahe ki tyane tumace sarva aparadha mapha karaveta ani eka tharalelya avadhiparyanta tumhala sandhi pradana karavi te (loka) mhanale, tumhi tara amacyasarakheca manava ahata. Tumhi he icchita ki amhala tya daivatancya puja-arcanepasuna rokhave, jyanci bhakti-aradhana amace vadavadila karata rahile, bare tara amacyasamora ekhade spasta pramana tari sadara kara
